items.name: SAP Field Service Management
items.description: Used by service engineers to book working hours and materials for service orders and report performed work.

items.name: Fluix
items.description: Used to access and complete service checklists and digital forms. Engineers use Fluix to view, fill in and submit required service documentation in the field.

items.name: Axxerion
items.description: Used to review and accept required work permits before starting service activities on site. Permits must be accepted prior to executing work.
